course.subject: MECH
course.name: Fundamental Building Blocks for Microsystem Technologies
course.description: This is an entry level course on microsystems and relevant technologies. The topics to be covered include introduction to miniaturization and scaling laws, thermal-mechanical material properties at multi-scales, self assembly process, basics of microfabrication and packaging, introduction to micro-electro-mechanical-systems (MEMS). The emphasis will be placed on the applications of nanotechnologies and microsystems in engineering.
course.prerequisites: A passing grade in HKCEE Physics / AS Physics / AL Physics, OR level 3 or above in HKDSE 1/2x Physics
